name: GrammarViz
paper: Time series anomaly discovery with grammar-based compression. EDBT
description: GrammarViz approach for time series pattern discovery is based on two algorithms that have linear time and space complexity: (i) Symbolic Aggregate approXimation (SAX), that discretizes the input time series into a string, and (ii) Sequitur, that induces a context-free grammar (CFG) from it.
bibtex: @inproceedings{Senin2015TimeSA,title={Time series anomaly discovery with grammar-based compression},author={Pavel Senin and Jessica Lin and Xing Wang and Tim Oates and S. Gandhi and Arnold P. Boedihardjo and Crystal Chen and Susan Frankenstein},booktitle={International Conference on Extending Database Technology},year={2015},}
